name: Magic Seeing Things
description: This is designed to improve the readability of "The American Political System: Third Addition."
additional_info:
While written explicitly for, "The American Political System: Third Addition," these styles may work with other textbooks published by Norton.

Update History:
 • 3/26/19--> Initial commit.
 • 4/3/19----> Re-implementing code which existed but went unused in prior version. Fixed elements missed by general styling.
 • 4/7/19----> Refactored similar or redundant code into a single block of element styling (line heights now responsive to font-size).
 • 4/10/19--> Regarding lists and list items, removed code and increased specificity to prevent first characters of a list item from being highlighted. Added contrast to final chapter pages.
